name: Parse HIPAA Server Example
description: An example Parse API server using the parse-server and CareKit

PARSE_SERVER_APPLICATION_ID.description: A unique identifier for your app.

PARSE_SERVER_PRIMARY_KEY.description: A key that overrides all permissions. Keep this secret.

PARSE_SERVER_READ_ONLY_PRIMARY_KEY.description: A key that allows read only access. Keep this secret.

PARSE_SERVER_URL.description: URL to connect to your Heroku instance (update with your app's name + PARSE_MOUNT)

PARSE_SERVER_PUSH.description: Configuration for push, as stringified JSON. See http://docs.parseplatform.org/parse-server/guide/#push-notifications.

PARSE_SERVER_AUTH_PROVIDERS.description: Configuration for your authentication providers, as stringified JSON. See http://docs.parseplatform.org/parse-server/guide/#oauth-and-3rd-party-authentication.

PARSE_SERVER_S3_BUCKET.description: The name of your S3 Bucket.

PARSE_SERVER_S3_BUCKET_REGION.description: The region for the S3 Bucket.

PARSE_SERVER_S3_BUCKET_ENCRYPTION.description: AES256 or aws:kms, or if you do not pass this, encryption won't be done.

PARSE_SERVER_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Unique string used for encrypting files stored by parse-hipaa.

PARSE_SERVER_OBJECT_ID_SIZE.description: Integer value, parse defaults to 10, 32 is probably better for medical apps and large tables.

PARSE_SERVER_CLOUD.description: Path to cloud code, default is /parse/cloud/main.js.

PARSE_SET_USER_CLP.description: Set the Class Level Permissios of the _User schema so only authenticated users can access, default 1.

PARSE_SERVER_ALLOW_CLIENT_CLASS_CREATION.description: Don't allow classes to be created on the client side..

PARSE_SERVER_ALLOW_CUSTOM_OBJECTID.description: Required to be true for ParseCareKit.

PARSE_SERVER_DIRECT_ACCESS.description: Known to cause crashes when true on single instance of server and not behind public server.

PARSE_SERVER_ENABLE_PRIVATE_USERS.description: Set to 'true' if new users should be created without public read and write access.

PARSE_VERBOSE.description: Enable verbose output on the server.

MOUNT_PATH.description: The mount path should be the same as the docker name.
